text: The 2018 season for began in January at the Tour Down Under. As a UCI WorldTeam, they were automatically invited and obligated to send a squad to every event in the UCI World Tour. ==Team roster== Riders who joined the team for the 2018 season {| class="wikitable" |- !Rider !2017 team |- |Marcel Kittel || |- |Ian Boswell || |- |Nathan Haas || |- |Alex Dowsett || |- |Willie Smit || |- |Steff Cras || |- |Matteo Fabbro || |} Riders who left the team during or after the 2017 season {| class="wikitable" |- !Rider !2018 team |- |Alexander Kristoff || |- |Angel Vicioso || Retires |- |Rein Taaramäe || |- |Alberto Losada || Retires |- |Michael Morkov || |- |Sven Erik Bystrøm || |} ==Season victories== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
